title: Weekly Digest (23 February, 2020 - 1 March, 2020)
body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 45 issues were created.
Of these, 24 issues have been closed and 21 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #10109 [Wallet universal qrcode scanner does not fails gracefully (an invalid UI state is displayed)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10109), by [3esmit](https://github.com/3esmit)
:green_heart: #10107 [Wallet QRCode Scanner says invalid address for valid address scanned](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10107), by [3esmit](https://github.com/3esmit)
:green_heart: #10106 [[#10084]  Make commands in chat available on Ropsten for e2e builds](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10106), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #10105 [Add Send all to Send transaction](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10105), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #10103 [Add fiat entry in Send transaction](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10103), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #10101 [Add support for adding new accounts in wallet with keycard](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10101), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #10100 [[#9749] Support importing private key and seed](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10100), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #10099 [WIP Update UI for group chat creation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10099), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:green_heart: #10097 [Status Starter Pack](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10097), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #10095 [IOS build is keeping logged out after several minutes of inactivity](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10095), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10093 [Value is not supported in EIP681 links](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10093), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10092 [Set waku mode dynamically](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10092), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:green_heart: #10090 [Use community WebView](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10090), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:green_heart: #10089 [Override the behaviour of public chat' unread messages indicator](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10089), by [errorists](https://github.com/errorists)
:green_heart: #10087 [Identify new chats on the list](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10087), by [errorists](https://github.com/errorists)
:green_heart: #10084 [Make commands in chat available on Ropsten for e2e builds](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10084), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10083 [Implement new shorter universal links](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10083), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #10080 [Design a proper NFC tag emulation mode](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10080), by [guylouis](https://github.com/guylouis)
:green_heart: #10077 [Can't accept agreement on ENS registration when app translated into French ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10077), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #10069 [Use Android specific icons](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10069), by [errorists](https://github.com/errorists)
:green_heart: #10067 [Comparing of Safety Numbers](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10067), by [decanus](https://github.com/decanus)
## CLOSED ISSUES
:heart: #10111 [don't use sandbox for Nix Cache builds](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10111), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #10110 [Fix group chat cannot be started bug](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10110), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:heart: #10108 [[debug] logging](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10108), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:heart: #10104 [fix creation of pkg folder for latest.json](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10104), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #10102 [fix sent messages confirmations](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10102), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:heart: #10098 [Messages are not confirmed ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10098), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #10096 [Fix balance adress check](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10096), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #10094 [don't use Jenkins master host for combined jobs](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10094), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #10091 [Fix geth logs on Android 10](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10091), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:heart: #10088 [[#10010] Start wallet service for keycard acc](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10088), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:heart: #10086 [skipped rest of e2e with deep links and attempt to fix mailserver test](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10086), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #10085 [Added scroll](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10085), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #10082 [nix: force sandbox in CI](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10082), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #10081 [Add missing keycard event handlers](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10081), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:heart: #10079 [fix detecting NixOS, uname can be deceptive](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10079), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #10078 [use Android keystore from Jenkins credentials](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10078), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #10076 [Fix leftover after #10073 changes](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10076), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:heart: #10075 [Added scroll and disable deep link e2e](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10075), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #10074 [Add keycard animation to be used in new flows](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10074), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:heart: #10073 [Separate hardwallet events into multiple ns](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10073), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:heart: #10072 [upgrade react-native-status-keycard to 2.5.19](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10072), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #10071 [e2e: fix handling of GitHub token](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10071), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #10070 [Fix for e2e 6225](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10070), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #10068 [[#10012] Show remaining PIN attemts only after entering wrong PIN](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10068), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
## LIKED ISSUE
:+1: #10106 [[#10084]  Make commands in chat available on Ropsten for e2e builds](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10106), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
It received :+1: x2, :smile: x0, :tada: x0 and :heart: x1.
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #10100 [[#9749] Support importing private key and seed](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10100), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
It received 21 comments.

 - - - 
# PULL REQUESTS
Last week, 39 pull requests were created, updated or merged.
## UPDATED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 7 pull requests were updated.
:yellow_heart: #10106 [[#10084]  Make commands in chat available on Ropsten for e2e builds](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10106), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #10100 [[#9749] Support importing private key and seed](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10100), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #10099 [WIP Update UI for group chat creation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10099), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #10092 [Set waku mode dynamically](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10092), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:yellow_heart: #10090 [Use community WebView](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10090), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:yellow_heart: #9993 [[#9789] Add a loading indicator and button to username input of start…](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9993), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #9970 [disable biometric auth when device can't save password (rooted)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9970), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
## MERGED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 32 pull requests were merged.
:purple_heart: #10111 [don't use sandbox for Nix Cache builds](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10111), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)

:purple_heart: #10082 [nix: force sandbox in CI](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10082), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)

 - - - 
# COMMITS
Last week there were 33 commits.
:hammer_and_wrench: [Upgrade status-go  Signed-off-by: Andrea Maria Piana <andrea.maria.piana@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/6a9eef1c2a68aca6cd5fbdfb4e6cf0de5798d10f) by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:hammer_and_wrench: [don't use sandbox for Nix Cache builds  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/8ac20b442e230295d0ac7d993e4955abacc930e7) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [upgrade status-go  Signed-off-by: Andrea Maria Piana <andrea.maria.piana@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/f9af0825cea989009009f84c43301455a452da79) by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix creation of pkg folder for latest.json  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/001264bd1aa33c060352452b891e12f621eb0012) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Fix balance adress check  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/de8d109ba161befde06f2a0733db42492542ed22) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Rework bottom-sheet component  Fixes #9848  Update initial content height  Review followup  Fix sheet disappear during drag  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/3ad9cfa269b7aab50560b9206fa3427b0c3edace) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [don't use Jenkins master host for combined jobs  This lowers the risk of someone extracting sensitive data from master.  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/8abea59196830492ccb8dc9a3aed50bb5a16aa03) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Fix geth logs on Android 10  From now on geth logs are stored at `/storage/emulated/0/Android/data/im.status.ethereum.debug/files/Download/geth.log` because app cant write to `sdcard/Download/geth.log`](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/89535ea8fc6d313c483845c5e3a3318f09562d9a) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [use Android keystore from Jenkins credentials  This way we don't have to store it on individual CI hosts.  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/cb78293db7f441613ea82a429327d734ccd8aee9) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#10010] Start wallet service for keycard acc](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/988a7f6b0c1af1e4d1dce9e3649ba2d744f4f178) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Remove unused translatins  Signed-off-by: Serhy <sergii@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/490c8f87768eedf861dd8e6e0b17197966792e5d) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Do not use naked-address when hashing messages prior to Keycard signing  Signed-off-by: Vitaliy Vlasov <siphiuel@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/8c23975ad71bed0504acb45524843150cfa5d638) by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:hammer_and_wrench: [skipped rest of e2e with deep links and attempt to fix mailserver test  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/a76a4f6878b46fb8531a532c6617ff41c9330ec0) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add mark all read  Signed-off-by: Andrea Maria Piana <andrea.maria.piana@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/21ef5a68b884e9170ea85a63509184112f38e13c) by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add animation for keycard interaction  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/c9d1adbc275a0b556efea267d6947350b6296c2a) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add missing keycard event handlers](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/bca946aa7846524c0fb55e42870da3e55a9d5ed3) by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:hammer_and_wrench: [nix: force sandbox in CI  For more details see: https://github.com/status-im/security-internal/blob/master/overview/infra.md#continuous-integration-ci  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/1c81d6e190f4995903373adad7c5599e5b134de4) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix scroll  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/8d95515480ec2c7a5320b2278e1326852dfdb249) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#9886] App shows 'buy' for stickerpack user owns when pressing on sticker in chat  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/6e3784d67168eeda44842222e1b7faa24f657632) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix detecting NixOS, uname can be deceptive  specifically inside of Docker containers  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/17e5fc4dd47a4951cc40c9ac6eaddeabc3b003e9) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Fix leftover after #10073 changes](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/999bb9940eb7549f9ac1f61b38f6586c58b030d7) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [added scroll and disable deep link e2e  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/9f2e2f9d3e0d7b1514ec6159bb08c532c72665b3) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Do not change keychain method on auth-bio fail  Do not change auth method if user does not save password  Sanity check - fix only for biometric method  Check for new auth method only when save password  ScrollView Persist taps on login view  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/ff1022f337efd565f9e79e043ab45b84c2e44005) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Separate hardwallet events into multiple ns  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/f18e7d746be7a158b0b8f72d2efe40e6897b35ec) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#10002] Follow up after #10008  - ensure that `:key-uid` is always added to `app-db` with proper case - tests which cover multiacc duplication case](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/9a713148c7729e5de82eb1fc5e6ff56dd440271f) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [upgrade react-native-status-keycard to 2.5.18  This adds the exportKeyWithPath() method we use in: src/status_im/hardwallet/card.cljs  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/e5f7a94ee29382236063b81ce9dccaa0a4f2f880) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#10012] Show remaining PIN attemts only after entering wrong PIN](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/59184b12d05bd2f11cd5ee2e9d5c3d852b83a214) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Clean up after recent tx history changes:  - unused code is removed - "load more" button is hidden for a new account - each next page of tx history contains 20 transfers   unless thare is no enough transfers in history](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/807c8377d441abefcbc0c1bec14f23231a57b937) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
